answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Amanda - the Alliance is hosting an "Organizational Values and Culture Change" webinar on August 28 (free for members $49 for nonmembers) that you may find informative.  The guest speaker is David Childs, Palmdale, CA City Manager.  Visit this link for more information.
http://transformgov.org/en/CalendarEvent/101004/Managers_Forum_Organizational_Values_and_Culture_Change 
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org 
888-468-6450

answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
Amanda -
You might also contact Michelle Flaherty - she held (or holds) a similar role with the City of Rockville, MD:
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/people/contact/399863

author: Amanda Collins
text: I am interested in knowing what service area/department spearheads Corporate Culture in your organizations. Do you have a "Corporate Culture Specialist" or is it assigned as an additional responsibility to an individual or team.  Any job descriptions you may have that speak to this role would also be appreciated. Thank you.
title: Corporate Culture
